mapper.insert: insert into qna(seq,id,name,title,content) values((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from qna),#{id},#{name},#{title},#{content})
mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title},content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select seq,id,name,title,content,to_char(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as regdate,state,cnt from qna where seq=#{seq}
mapper.update: update qna set cnt=cnt+1 where seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into replyqna(seq,name,content,id) values ((select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from replyqna),#{name},#{content},#{id})
mapper.update: update replyqna set content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select qnaseq,seq,name,content,to_char(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')as regdate,id from replyqna where qnaseq=#{seq}
